title: Flooring Installation
description: Duncan MC Construction has the expertise to install all types of flooring. From hardwood, laminate, tile, carpet tiles, engineered wood, and vinyl plank we can help you with your flooring needs.

title: Bathroom & Kitchen Remodels
description: Whether you're looking to update a bathroom or your kitchen, Duncan MC Constrcution has got you covered. Call and tell us about your project.

title: Residential Home Repairs
description: While you might not need a full remodel, but need a few repairs done around your house. New windows? Replace a handrail or ramp? Duncan MC Construction has you covered.
